column5: has anyone been to this outfitter ?? thinking of taking my wife to poirier lake any info would be great thanks for your time wb
Friends of mine go there and like it a lot. They really like the folks that run the camp and fishing is said to be as good as any other shield lake. Pooch
Are you talking about Loonhaunt Lake north of Fort Frances? If so, consider calling Ross's Camp in Emo, ON. DV
